arabicText: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And	who believe in this (Qur’an) which	
has been sent	down upon you, O beloved	
Prophet, (Muhammad - peace and	
blessings	 be	 upon	 him)	 and	 what	 was	
sent	down	before	you;	and	are	certain	of	
the	Hereafter.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur woh ke Īmān lāyeñ us per jo aey	
Mehboob tumhāri	taraf	utra aur jo tum se	
pahle utra aur Ākhirat per yaqeen	
rakheiñ.

arabicText: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًۭى مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
It is they who are on guidance from their	
Lord; and	they	are the successful.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Wohi log	apne Rab	ki taraf se hidāyat per	
haiñ aur wohi murād ko pahuñch ne	
wāle

arabicText: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
englishTranslationText:
As for those whose fate is disbelief, whether	
you warn	them or do not warn them it is all	
one for them; they will not believe.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Beshak wo jin ki qismat me kufr hai unheiñ	
barābar hai chāhe tum unheiñ darao ya	 na	
darao woh Imān lāne ke nhiñ

arabicText: خَتَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَعَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِمْ ۖ وَعَلَىٰٓ أَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ غِشَـٰوَةٌۭ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
englishTranslationText:
Allah has sealed their hearts and their ears,	
and on their eyes is	a covering; and for	them	
is a terrible punishment.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Allah ne unke	diloñ per aur kanoñ per muhar	
kardi aur	unki	 ānkhoñ per ghta top hai aur	
unke liye	Bada 'Azab

arabicText: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
englishTranslationText:
And among the people are some that say,	
“We believe in Allah and	 the Last Day	 **”	
whereas they are not believers!
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur kuch log * kahte haiñ ke ham Allah aur	
pichle din ** per Iman lāye aur woh Īmān	
wāle	nahi

arabicText: يُخَـٰدِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَمَا يَخْدَعُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
englishTranslationText:
They wish to deceive Allah and the believers;	
and in fact they deceive none	 except	
themselves and they do	not have any	
understanding.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Fareb diya chahte haiñ Allah aur Imān wāloñ	
ko aur Haqeeqat me fareb nhiñ dete magar	
apni	jānoñ ko aur unheiñ sha'oor nhiñ

arabicText: فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْذِبُونَ
englishTranslationText:
In their hearts is a disease, so	Allah has	
increased	 their disease; and for them is	 a	
painful punishment, because of their lies.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Unke diloñ meiñ bimāri hai to Allah ne unki	
bimāri aur badhāi aur unke liye Dard-nāk	
‘azāb hai,	badla unke jhoot ka

arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُصْلِحُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And when it is	said	to them, “Do not cause	
turmoil in the earth”, they say, “We are only	
peacemakers!”
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur	jo unse kaha jāye zameen meiñ fasād na	
karo	to kahte haiñ hum to sañwarne wāle	
haiñ

arabicText: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْسِدُونَ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
englishTranslationText: Pay heed! It is they	who	are mischievous, but they do not have sense.
romanUrduTranslationText: Sunta hai! wohi fasādi haiñ\  magar unheiñ	sha'oor	nahi

arabicText: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ ءَامِنُوا۟ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلنَّاسُ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And when it is said to them, “Believe as the	others believe”,they say,	“Shall we	believe as the foolish believe?” Pay heed! It is they who	
are the fools, but they do not	know.
romanUrduTranslationText:
Aur jab unse kaha jāye Īmān lāo jaise aur log Īmān lāye haiñ to kaheñ	kiya	ham	ahmaqoñ	ki tarah Īmān le āayeñ sunta hai! wohi	ahmaq	
haiñ	magar jānte nahiñ

arabicText: وَإِذَا لَقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا وَإِذَا خَلَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ شَيَـٰطِينِهِمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مَعَكُمْ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُسْتَهْزِءُونَ
englishTranslationText:
And when they meet with the	believers,	they	say, “We believe”; and when they are	 alone with their devils, they say, “We are undoubtedly	with	you,	we were just	mocking!”. And when they meet with the believers, they	
say,	 “We	 believe”;	 and	 when	 they	 are	 alone	
with	their	devils,	they	say,	“We	are	undoubtedly	with	you,	we	were	just	mocking!”
romanUrduTranslationText: Aur jab Īmān wāloñ	se mileiñ to kaheiñ	ham	Īmān lāye, aur jab apne shaitānoñ ke	 sath	akele hoñ to kaheiñ hum tumhare	 sāth haiñ hum to yuñ hi	hansi karte haiñ

arabicText: ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَهْزِئُ بِهِمْ وَيَمُدُّهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
englishTranslationText: Allah (befitting His Majesty) ridicules them, leaving them to	wander blindly in their	rebellion.
romanUrduTranslationText: Allah unse istehza farmāta hai (jaisa uski ki shān ke lāyeq hai) aur unheiñ dheel	deta	hai	ke	apni	sarkashi	meiñ	bhatakte	raheñ
